pixlab

Class Helpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • pixlab.Helpers

  • public class Helpers
extends java.lang.Object
    AP CmpSci 2018-2019 Pixlab (Phase 1) Helper methods used to convert the original PixLab project image formats to a 3D format using RGB layers and to convert back and forth between these formats to allow for use of existing display, write, and other methods from the original PixLab project.
    Version:
    9/28/2018
    Author:
    Eric Johns

      Constructor and Description
      Helpers()
